availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. R. Vaughan (Hopkins County, Ky, cabinet maker )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Vaughan. Father of Willis M. Vaughan, Charles M. Vaughan, Albert Vaughan, and Cordie Vaughan. Cabinet maker in Madisonville, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed James W. Wicks as a cabinet maker in Madisonville in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 835.
